patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,6 +1,103 @@
+import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
 import 'package:flutter_riverpod/flutter_riverpod.dart';
+import 'download_button_state.dart'; // Import the provider
 
+class AnimatedDownloadButton extends ConsumerWidget {
+  final VoidCallback onPressed;
+
+  const AnimatedDownloadButton({Key? key, required this.onPressed})
+      : super(key: key);
+
+  @override
+  Widget build(BuildContext context, WidgetRef ref) {
+    // Watch the state from the provider
+    final isChecked = ref.watch(downloadButtonProvider);
+
+    return GestureDetector(
+      onTap: () {
+        onPressed();
+        // Use the provider's notifier to toggle state
+        ref.read(downloadButtonProvider.notifier).toggleState();
+      },
+      child: AnimatedContainer(
+        duration: const Duration(milliseconds: 400),
+        width: isChecked ? 150 : 160,
+        padding: const EdgeInsets.all(5),
+        decoration: BoxDecoration(
+          color: Colors.transparent,
+          border: Border.all(
+            color: isChecked ? Colors.green : const Color(0xFF5B5BF0),
+            width: 2,
+          ),
+          borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(50),
+        ),
+        child: Row(
+          mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
+          children: [
+            AnimatedContainer(
+              duration: const Duration(milliseconds: 400),
+              height: 45,
+              width: 45,
+              decoration: BoxDecoration(
+                color: isChecked ? Colors.green : const Color(0xFF5B5BF0),
+                shape: BoxShape.circle,
+                boxShadow: [
+                  BoxShadow(
+                    color: Colors.white.withOpacity(0.7),
+                    blurRadius: isChecked ? 16 : 0,
+                    spreadRadius: isChecked ? 16 : 0,
+                  ),
+                ],
+              ),
+              child: Center(
+                child: AnimatedOpacity(
+                  duration: const Duration(milliseconds: 400),
+                  opacity: isChecked ? 0 : 1,
+                  child: const Icon(
+                    Icons.download,
+                    color: Colors.white,
+                  ),
+                ),
+              ),
+            ),
+            const SizedBox(width: 10),
+            Expanded(
+              child: AnimatedOpacity(
+                duration: const Duration(milliseconds: 400),
+                opacity: isChecked ? 0 : 1,
+                child: const Text(
+                  "Download CV",
+                  textAlign: TextAlign.center,
+                  style: TextStyle(
+                    fontFamily: "poppins",
+                    fontSize: 16,
+                    color: Colors.black,
+                  ),
+                ),
+              ),
+            ),
+            if (isChecked)
+              AnimatedOpacity(
+                duration: const Duration(milliseconds: 400),
+                opacity: 1,
+                child: const Text(
+                  "Installed",
+                  style: TextStyle(
+                    fontFamily: "poppins",
+                    fontSize: 16,
+                    color: Colors.green,
+                  ),
+                ),
+              ),
+          ],
+        ),
+      ),
+    );
+  }
+}
+
+
 // Define a StateNotifier to manage the button's state
 class DownloadButtonState extends StateNotifier<bool> {
   DownloadButtonState() : super(false);

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,56 @@
+import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
+
+class CustomElevatedIconButton extends StatelessWidget {
+  final String label;
+  final IconData icon;
+  final VoidCallback onPressed;
+
+  const CustomElevatedIconButton({
+    super.key,
+    required this.label,
+    required this.icon,
+    required this.onPressed,
+  });
+
+  @override
+  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
+    return ElevatedButton.icon(
+      iconAlignment: IconAlignment.start,
+      style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
+        padding: const EdgeInsets.symmetric(vertical: 15, horizontal: 20),
+        side: const BorderSide(
+          color: Colors.yellow,
+          width: 2,
+        ),
+        backgroundColor: Colors.white,
+        elevation: 0,
+        shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(
+          borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(30),
+        ),
+      ),
+      icon: Transform.translate(
+        offset: const Offset(-10, 0),
+        child: Container(
+          decoration: const BoxDecoration(
+            color: Colors.yellow,
+            shape: BoxShape.circle,
+          ),
+          padding: const EdgeInsets.all(6),
+          child: Icon(
+            icon,
+            color: Colors.white,
+            size: 16,
+          ),
+        ),
+      ),
+      onPressed: onPressed,
+      label: Text(
+        label,
+        style: const TextStyle(
+          fontFamily: "poppins",
+          color: Colors.black,
+        ),
+      ),
+    );
+  }
+}
